text: The 1936–37 Drexel Dragons men's basketball team represented Drexel Institute of Technology during the 1936–37 men's basketball season. The Dragons, led by 5th year head coach Ernest Lange, played their home games at Curtis Hall Gym and were members of the Eastern Pennsylvania Collegiate Basketball League (EPCBL). ==Roster== ==Schedule== |- !colspan=9 style="background:#F8B800; color:#002663;"| Regular season |- ==Awards== ;Matthew Donaldson *EPCBL All- Conference Second Team ;David Curry *EPCBL All-Conference Honorable Mention ;Theodore Layton *EPCBL All-Conference Honorable Mention ;William Lignelli *EPCBL All-Conference Honorable Mention ==References== Category:Drexel Dragons men's basketball seasons Drexel Drexel Dragons Men's Basketball Drexel Dragons Men's Basketball
title: 1936–37 Drexel Dragons men's basketball team
